This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking my dog with my 3 year old son in the local park in whitefield manchester, it was a very clear warm sunny evening with a few white clouds and blue sky, after playing football with my son we sat down on the grass and took some photos of my son & me with my mobile phone a blackberry,then i took two shots of the sky and clouds about 10-25 seconds apart. i hadnt noticed anything in the sky at the time as i was looking at my phone whilst taking the shot and i heard no sound but looking at the pictures on my phone the next day i noticed a strange object and upon zooming in on the pic i noticed the strange cloud formation like a triangle and an arrow shape. zooming in on the tail section of the arrow shape cloud i noticed a very clear face. this is a genuine picture taken on my cell phone and i cannot explain it hope you can.
